plot: Bart becomes a successful caddie, but Marge thinks it may ruin his character.

Bart takes a summer job as a caddie, he and his friends start kissing up to the wealthy clients in order to get more money. When Marge notices what Bart is doing, she and Lisa begin to take matters into their own hands. Marge does an online petition to prevent caddies from kissing up to the wealthy clients, it soon threatens the club's status. Bart is angered by his mother's actions, he soon becomes a caddie for the club president, Bildorf. Bart decides to make golf a religion, much to Marge's dismay. When Marge tries to get the other religions to join her cause, they end up siding with the golfers. Bildorf refuses to let Bart caddie for him and he goes back to his old caddie. Bart decides to get revenge on Bildorf and the rest of the golfers by renting ATVs for himself and his friends, they begin trashing the golf course, Marge becomes pleased with Bart's action. However, the police show up and they arrest Bildorf for illegally running a sex cult at the golf club.—dawsonpersi
